message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  Let's try something a little closer to the middle.
While I appreciate the move towards the middle, Bob, I think we can find something a bit more equitable considering the time constraint and the decreasing value.
Okay, Bob, let's not waste any more time.  This is a slight adjustment to your offer, keeping the inflation in mind.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair deal considering the inflation working against you.
This still doesn't feel quite fair to me given the circumstances, Bob.  Time is valuable, but so is a fair deal.
Bob, I'm trying to meet you halfway here. This offer acknowledges the time pressure but still gives us both a decent share.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - it's more than fair considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
Okay, Bob, you've got yourself a deal. It's not ideal, but time is running out.
